pages.text: $(li)Piglin Brutes are a hostile and stronger variant of $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/piglin)Piglin$(/l) that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/bastion_remnant)Bastion Remnants$(/l) in the Nether.$(br)$(li)They can not be distracted with gold.$(br)$(li)They will attack you even if you are wearing a piece of $(l:patchouli:armors/golden_armor)Golden Armor$(/l).
